about_the_game:
Let's get squeezed by Mengele girlfriend

This work
When the player sticks out his tongue, she sticks out hers, too, and they continue to tongue each other.
They rub their tongues against our facial movements.
They are just saying erotic things and squeezing me a lot.
During the act, you can play with only facial movements.
Both hands can be free.
Also, you can choose from 3 different types of clothes for her.

Works in a variety of environments
Quest 2 (OculusLink)
HtcVive　
All have been tested on actual devices
Works on PC desktops.

Motion gesture support
You can answer her questions by shaking your head.
She reacts to various facial movements.
If you stick out your tongue, she will move her face closer to you.
She will respond to your facial movements.

Interlocking with VR controller movement
When you tell her to move by herself, the controller is linked to the movement.

Vibration function of VR controller
If you do not have an electric masturbator, you can use this one.

Compatible with electric masturbators

Full voice
They say lots of naughty things!


Compatible with electric onahole Manual operation is also supported

During the act, she will move in conjunction with the player's movements by selecting "Please→Move by myself".
On the PC desktop, she will move with the movement of the mouse, and in VR, she will move with the swing of the controller.

Normally, she moves automatically.
At this time, an electric onahole and a controller vibrator are interlocked.

Only PC, but electric masturbator is supported.
It works with Buttpulg compatible devices.
Connection is automatic.
You can check if the device is connected or not by pressing
You can check the number of electric onahole devices connected by increasing or decreasing the number of devices on the menu screen.

Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA.


How to operate

0 VR Controller
Hand Trigger" Movement
Hand Trigger + Analog Stick" Turn
Index Trigger" Selection, hand menu
Menu, buttons 1, 2, 3, 4 Menu

0 Hand menu
　After selecting with analog keys, release index trigger to select

0 Motion gestures (common)
Vertical face wave Yes
Sideways face wave" No

0 Motion gesture (in action)
Bow deeply. Stick out tongue.
Look away from her, either to the left or right, and then look at her again.　

0 In PC desktop mode
Mouse: Viewpoint control, motion gestures
Left mouse click" Selection, sticking out tongue
Right mouse click" menu
Esc" Mouse cursor On/Off
SKey" Tongue in and out
WKey - Speed up
XKey: Speed down
AKey, I'm coming.
DKey" I like it.


About the operation

0 Desktop PC
win10GamingPC (can be displayed and played on a monitor)

0 PCVR
win10GamingPC
Oculus Quest 2 (OculusLink) confirmed to work on actual equipment
HtcVive Operation confirmed

content_descriptors.notes:
If you make the wrong decision, the woman will hurt you.
If you do not make a mistake, you will have consensual sex with a woman, all with my consent.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR

short_description: Let's give her a lot of squeeze. It's been a while since she came to my room.　 I wonder if she's going to want me forever today, it's hard... Can be played on either PCVR or PC desktop.
